duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the day-to-day operations of the Accessibility Division to ensure all deliverables are met.
Inspire and lead the operations team to enhance productivity and cost-effectiveness.
Build and nurture connections with vendors, suppliers, and stakeholders.
Adhere to laws, develop safety policies, and ensure workplace safety.
Drive continuous improvement across all processes.
Oversee necessary paperwork and digital records.
Handle billing practices, invoice processing, and collections.
Examine sales data, marketing efforts, and strategize for success.
Ensure excellent customer service by collecting feedback and monitoring reviews.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Operations Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
